mapper.insert: insert into cryptoBoard (c_id, u_id, u_name, symbol, c_date, c_update, content) values ( cryptoboard_seq.nextval, #{u_id}, #{u_name}, #{symbol}, sysdate, sysdate, #{content})
mapper.delete: delete cryptoBoard where c_id = #{c_id} and symbol = #{symbol}
mapper.select: select c_id, u_id, u_name, symbol, c_date, c_update, content from cryptoBoard where symbol = #{symbol} order by c_date desc
